snippet.title: I Was Lost - Official Trailer | Latin American Games Showcase
snippet.description: Take a look at gameplay in this trailer for I Was Lost, an upcoming puzzle game where each level is a poem's verse that unravels as you progress. Move walls, avoid danger in a labyrinthic poem, and create your own stories in I Was Lost. Control not only your position but also move walls to create new paths and escape from seemingly impossible situations. I Was Lost will be available on Steam and Xbox Series X/S.
